text:
Amber Rose sleeps through 4-hour home invasion

Amber Rose becomes a victim of home invasion.

According to multiple outlets, the television personality got quite a scare Tuesday morning, May 16, when she discovered that a man had broken into her Los Angeles-area pad while she was catching her beauty sleep.

TMZ reports that the suspect was in her home for a whopping four hours before he was discovered. Not only that, but many including her son, mother, assistant and bodyguards were all also home at the time — and at possible risk, during the time of the incident.

Law enforcement sources revealed that the man gained access to Rose’s residence by breaking one of her kitchen windows and entering through her pantry. It was during the early hours of the morning; however, when the former video vixen discovered the broken window and checked her home surveillance footage to determine the cause, she discovered that a man had entered the home. She also witnessed footage of the assailant leaving the scene.

Shortly after, police were called. Oddly enough, according to TMZ, nothing appeared to have been stolen. It appears the man only hung out in Rose’s home for a number of hours.

Though Rose has yet to respond to the scary event via social media, this comes on the heels of another celebrity-related crime in Tinseltown, as armed robbers reportedly ran off with approximately $1.5M from A$AP Rocky’s home.

“At 11:30 pm last night officers responded to a home invasion robbery,” an LAPD spokesperson told E! News of the crime, withholding the name of the victim. “A female was walking outside of the home when she was confronted by three suspects and one of them was armed with a handgun. They forced the victim back into the home. They attempted to take a safe and were unsuccessful, but they took property.”

Meanwhile, Rose’s incident is currently an ongoing investigation.
